public class PersonalizableSuggestGroup

Method Detail

getRawPersonalizations

public static java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> getRawPersonalizations()
Factory method to get raw personalizations from MDS.

Returns:
List of PersonalizableObject from MDS.

load

public static java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> load(java.util.List<SearchSuggestGroup> groups)
Turn a List of SearchSuggestGroup into a merged List of PersonalizableObject, retaining the order of the passed List, or of the Personalizations if they exist. The returned list will contain PersonalizableSuggestGroup objects for every SearchSuggestGroup, and placeholder PersonalizableObjects for the MDS loaded entries that do not have a corresponding SearchSuggestGroup.

Parameters:
groups - List of SearchSuggestGroup appropriate for this user session.
Returns:
a Merged List.

save

public static void save(java.util.List<PersonalizableObject> pGroups)
Save the personalized Objects for the current user MDS session. If no changes have been made by the user, then nothing is saved.

Parameters:
pGroups - Personalized Objects, some of which will be PersonalizableSuggestGroups.

deleteMetadata

public static void deleteMetadata()
Factory method to delete the MDS metadata for this user for Category Personalizations. The Base MDS document is unchanged.
